name: Apricot Chocolate Chip
snippet: Another new oatmeal cookie on the menu! Dried apricot & chocolate chips in a hearty oatmeal mix.

name: Darth Reese's
snippet: Uber chocolatey dough + Reese's Pieces. Welcome to the Darkside!

name: Chocolate + Rainbow Sprinkles
snippet: Rich chocolate cookie with a hint of hazelnut rolled in rainbow sprinkles. A true sweet treat!

name: Funfetti
snippet: A CZ favorite! Bringing back childhood goodness with fruity pebbles & sweet, subtle flavors.

name: Chocolate Chip
snippet: Our locally world famous chocolate chip and bestseller!! So perfect in so many ways.
